pullrequest.title: Fix model editor joint creation dialog relative pose update

content.raw:
I'm trying this:

1. Select parent and child

1. Edit relative pose to x == 1, y == 2, z == 3.

1. Press an align X button

I would expect only the X axis to change but the rest of the relative pose to stay the same. But what happens is that Y and Z are reset to the original value, moving the link to a completely new pose.

I have a possible solution for that on branch [issue_1844_7_louise](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/4ec9011a389ed345b6b0e797dac38ee26dcdb022?at=issue_1844_7_louise). Let me know what you think.
